verses.text: I was \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* when they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Our \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.
\w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* is \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* as a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* that is \w compact|strong="H2266"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*:

\w Whither|strong="H8033"\w* the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*, unto the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

For there are \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w thrones|strong="H3678"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, the \w thrones|strong="H3678"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.\f + \fr 122.5 \ft are…: Heb. do sit\f*
\w Pray|strong="H7592"\w* for the \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: they shall \w prosper|strong="H7951"\w* that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thee.
\w Peace|strong="H7965"\w* be within thy \w walls|strong="H2426"\w*, \add and\add* \w prosperity|strong="H7962"\w* within thy \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w*.
For my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* and \w companions’|strong="H7453"\w* sakes, I will now \w say|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add be\add* within thee.
Because of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* I will \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.
